snippet: Mayor Bob Filner, a Democrat, has been besieged by a blizzard of sexual harassment charges by employees and constituents.
abstract: San Diego Mayor Bob Filner is rejecting calls by allies for him to step down after being besieged by blizzard of sexual harassment charges by employees and constituents; issues apology for any misbehavior but denies sexually harassing anyone.

byline.contributor: Rob Davis contributed reporting from San Diego, Ian Lovett from Los Angeles and Jennifer Preston from New York.

lead_paragraph: Mayor Bob Filner, a Democrat, has been besieged by a blizzard of sexual harassment charges by employees and constituents.

headline.main: In San Diego, Mayor Rejects Calls by Allies to Step Down
headline.print_headline: In San Diego, Mayor Rejects Calls by Allies To Step Down
